summary:
Facilities Management Service (FMS) Employee A reported to Human Resources that while reviewing her Electronic Official Personnel Folder (eOPF), she found several documents belonging to two other employees. Documents for Employee B included one SF50 form with full name, full Social Security Number (SSN), date of birth, and other employment information. Documents for Employee C included four SF50 forms, four performance award VA4659 forms, and one performance appraisal with full name, full SSN, date of birth, and other employment information.
ACTION: The eOPF for Employee A has been disabled while the misfiled documents are being appropriately re-filed to the correct employee folders.

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
